projects.title: AI-Powered Resume Parser
projects.description: Developed a machine learning application that automatically extracts and categorizes information from resume PDFs. Built with Python, TensorFlow, and Flask with a React frontend.

projects.title: Smart Inventory System
projects.description: Created a real-time inventory management system with IoT integration for automatic stock tracking. Used Node.js, MongoDB, and React with AWS IoT services.

projects.title: Financial Data Visualization
projects.description: Built a comprehensive financial data dashboard that processes and visualizes market trends and investment opportunities. Implemented with Python, Django, D3.js, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Healthcare Scheduling Platform
projects.description: Designed and developed a patient scheduling system for healthcare providers that integrates with electronic health records. Built with Java Spring Boot, MySQL, and Angular.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Document Manager
projects.description: Created a secure document management system with version control, collaborative editing, and permission-based access. Developed using Next.js, Firebase, and Google Cloud Storage.
